specifications.Finish: Mechanical > Embossed Embossed is a fabric finish that creates a 3D effect on the surface using heat or pressure to form patterns or designs. It adds texture and depth, making the fabric more visually rich and stylish
specifications.Care Advice: Woven > Satin Weave > Satin This fabric is easily damaged by rubbing or scratching, so please handle it with care. Regenerated > Viscose Rayon This fabric can shrink or become distorted if it get wet. Store it in a cool, dry, well-ventilated location.
specifications.Care Instructions: Hand wash only Wash separately Turn inside out before washing, Do not wring Do not bleach Line dry Do not iron Sustainability Eco-forward > Dead Stock This fabric is deadstock (leftover from previous productions) and will not be restocked after selling out. Recommended Use Dresses
